body: Hi, we took over some files & chat logs from our two employees & luckily there was also some other hackers communication included (group chat etc.)
We are sure, that those 2 are members of a hacker group that recently attacked Eklamot.
We are giving you access to all files, however, we cannot open them - we dont have passwords, some data are also encrypted
Please, try to hack into these files, after that, we will also need some additional info about your efforts - we want to know HOW did you make it.
We need it ASAP, but make sure you will find as much as you can - any hidden data or weird encryptions could be useful for further investigation
Please find attached additional info about 4 zipped folders.
